text: Montholon is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Yonne department in central France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Aillant-sur-Tholon (the seat), Champvallon, Villiers-sur-Tholon and Volgré.Arrêté préfectoral 1 April 2016 == References == * INSEE Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Yonne
title: Montholon
